p: Details of the composition of the top 10 dominant bacteria at other classification levels are listed in Supplementary Table S 3. Specifically, Alphaproteobacteria, Gammaproteobacteria, unidentified-Actinobacteria dominate at the class taxonomic level; the dominant species at the order taxonomic level are Rhizobiales, Sphingomonadales and Gammaproteobacteria; the dominant species at the family taxonomic level are Rhizobiaceae, Pseudomonadaceae and Sphingomonadaceae; the dominant species at the species taxonomic level are Pantoea-brenneri, Neorhizobium-huautlense, and Pseudomonas-psychrotolerans.
